job description:
• A degree in Data Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Civil Engineering, Geography, Urban Planning or related field.
  • A minimum of 2 years of practical and proficient working experience with large datasets using open source programming and GIS-technologies such as Python, R, QGIS, PostgreSQL, PostGIS, Java Script.
  • Ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team of fellow data experts to devise innovative, practical solutions to complex problems in Mobility Analytics.
  • A strong passion for taking your knowledge and expertise and applying it in innovative ways to deliver ground breaking products that empower our clients
  • Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Proven analytical experience both in and out of the academic environment.
